content:
What specifically do I need to study to start writing my own proofs?

Which Lean4 materials present the main tactics (or functions) that I can use for this?

In that case, would be formal proofs not exams...

I would like to know which books or papers (preferably something very initial) are cool to learn these things.
You can have a look at our learning resources, for example #tpil or #mil
